mapper.select: SELECT B.POSTSN,B.TITLE,U.NICK,B2.BOARDTITLE,VIEWCNT, B.LIKECNT, B.CREATEDATETIME, B.UPDATEDATETIME FROM BOARDPOST B, USERDATA U, BOARD B2 WHERE B.USERSN = U.USERSN AND B.BOARDSN = B2.BOARDSN

SELECT B.POSTSN,B.TITLE,U.NICK,B2.BOARDTITLE,VIEWCNT, B.LIKECNT, B.CREATEDATETIME, B.UPDATEDATETIME FROM BOARDPOST B, USERDATA U, BOARD B2 WHERE B.USERSN = U.USERSN AND B.BOARDSN = B2.BOARDSN AND B2.BOARDSN = #{boardSN}

SELECT B.POSTSN, B.TITLE, U.NICK, B2.BOARDTITLE, BC.POSTCONTENT, B.VIEWCNT, B.LIKECNT, B.CREATEDATETIME, B.UPDATEDATETIME FROM BOARDPOST B, BOARDPOSTCONTENT BC, USERDATA U, BOARD B2 WHERE B.POSTSN = BC.POSTSN AND B.POSTSN = #{postSN} AND U.USERSN = B.USERSN AND B.BOARDSN = B2.BOARDSN

SELECT U.USERSN,B.POSTSN,B.TITLE,U.NICK,B2.BOARDTITLE,VIEWCNT, B.LIKECNT, B.CREATEDATETIME, B.UPDATEDATETIME FROM BOARDPOST B, USERDATA U, BOARD B2 where B.USERSN = U.USERSN AND B.BOARDSN = B2.BOARDSN AND u.usersn = #{userSN}
mapper.update: update boardpost set title = #{title}, updatedatetime = sysdate where postsn = #{postSN}
